imagine.description: Generate anime-styled images using AI (Model: animagine-xl-4.0). Provide detailed prompts for best results.
imagine.example: {}imagine 1girl, solo, long hair, blue eyes, school uniform, outdoors, cherry blossoms, masterpiece
imagine.result: Generates and sends an anime-style image based on your prompt, such as a detailed illustration of a girl in a school uniform amidst cherry blossoms.

vision.description: Analyze images using AI vision (Gemini 2.0). Attach an image or reply to a message with an image, or provide an image URL.
vision.result: Sends an AI-generated description and analysis of the provided image, detailing what's in it.

anime_recommend.description: Fetches a random anime and sends the recommendation.
anime_recommend.result: Displays an embed with comprehensive information about the specified anime, including synopsis, genres, episodes, rating, and poster image.

anime.description: Search for information about any anime.
anime.result: Sends an embed with comprehensive information about the specified anime, including synopsis, genres, episodes, rating, and poster image.

character.description: Search for information about any anime character.
character.result: Provides detailed information about the anime character, including description, anime/manga appearances, and images.

manga.description: Search for information about any anime manga.

about.result: Sends an embed with detailed information about the specified target, including avatar, stats, and links.

server.description: Fetch details about the current server, including server boosts, owner, and member stats.
server.result: Displays an embed with server information such as member count, boost level, owner, and creation date.

pfp.description: View the profile picture of a member or yourself.

banner.description: Check the banner of a member or yourself.

invite.description: Generate a server invite link of your current server.

perms.description: Display the permissions of a specific member or role.

server_emojis.description: List all custom emojis in the server.

server_roles.description: View who has which role, useful for auditing, cleaning up unused roles, or checking access levels.

memo.description: Play an emoji memory matching game. Find matching pairs of emojis within the time limit.

pt.description: Main PokéTwo command group. Access type, quest, special, shiny, collection, and server settings.
pt.related_commands: Use subcommands: type, quest, special, shiny, collection, settings

pt type.description: Set or view type ping preferences for Pokémon.

pt quest.description: Set or view quest region pings for legendary or mythical Pokémon.

pt special.description: Set roles for rare or regional Pokémon pings.

pt shiny.description: Manage your shiny hunt. Add, remove, list, or clear shiny targets.

pt collection.description: Manage your Pokémon collection. Add, remove, list, or clear Pokémon.

pt settings.description: View or configure server-wide Pokémon ping settings.

pokedex.description: Display detailed Pokémon information including stats, types, abilities, and sprites. Supports shiny and regional forms.

redirect.description: Set channels where quest/mission notifications will be redirected. Requires Manage Channels permission or Anya Manager role.

quest.description: Start or view your current quest/mission. Use 'quest newbie' for tutorial.

quest_roles.description: Admin command to set or list roles that can be randomly assigned as quest rewards.

inventory.description: View your quest tool inventory and collected items.

balance.description: Check your current quest points/stars balance.

shop.description: Browse and purchase quest tools and items using your points.

memory.description: Displays the bot's current memory usage.

ping.description: Checks the bot's response time and latency to the server.

uptime.description: Shows how long the bot has been running since its last restart.

credit.description: Displays the names of the people who contributed to the creation and development of the bot.

8ball.description: Ask the magic 8-ball a yes/no question and receive a random answer.

pat.description: Pat someone (or yourself) with a cute anime GIF.

cuddle.description: Cuddle someone (or yourself) with a cute anime GIF.

bite.description: Bite someone (or yourself) with an anime GIF.

kiss.description: Kiss someone (or yourself) with a cute anime GIF.

lick.description: Lick someone (or yourself) with an anime GIF.

hug.description: Hug someone (or yourself) with a warm anime GIF.

cry.description: Express sadness with a crying anime GIF.

wave.description: Wave at someone (or everyone) with an anime GIF.

slowclap.description: Give a slow clap with an anime GIF.

notes.description: Manage notes for members and note-taker roles. Use without arguments to see all commands, or with a member to view their notes.
notes.result: Shows a help embed with all notes commands, or displays the specified member's notes with pagination.

notes add.description: Add a note to a member's record. Only users with note-taker roles can add notes.
notes add.example: {}notes add @user This is a note about their behavior
notes add.result: Adds the note to the member's record and confirms with a temporary message.

notes help.description: Show detailed help for all notes commands.
notes help.result: Displays a comprehensive help embed explaining all notes subcommands and their usage.

notes config.description: Configure note-taker roles. Use without arguments to view current roles, or mention roles to add them. Use 'clear' to remove all roles.
notes config.result: Shows or updates the note-taker roles configuration.

memory.description: Displays the bot's current memory usage.
